name: Zombie Dungeon (itch)
description:
A randomly generated zombie shooting dungeon explorer with several different classes of enemies to fight through.

I made this game for the Prog-gen game jam (https://itch.io/jam/procedural-generation-jam). I've been sitting on this kind of game idea for a little while and this game jam provided me with a good chance to try it out.

Enjoy!
